task_prompt: 上网查大语言模型的最近进展
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "上网查大语言模型的最近进展"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 双击打开浏览器（Firefox Web Browser）

    2. 在浏览器地址栏中输入bing的网址

    3. 输入搜索词“大语言模型的最近进展”

    4. 点击搜索按钮进行搜索

    5. 从搜索结果中选择第一个的链接

    6. 点击链接打开网页

    7. 阅读网页内容以获取信息


现在的子任务是 "输入搜索词“大语言模型的最近进展”"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "输入搜索词“大语言模型的最近进展”"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
从屏幕截图来看，浏览器地址栏中已经输入了bing的网址，现在要做的是输入搜索词。根据屏幕截图，搜索框在屏幕的中央位置上方一些。需要使用鼠标点击搜索框，然后可以使用键盘输入搜索词。

以下是json格式的操作步骤：

```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":512,"height":400}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text":"大语言模型的最近进展"}
]
```

以上的操作步骤将完成点击搜索框并输入搜索词“大语言模型的最近进展”。实际屏幕大小以及组件布局会影响鼠标点击的准确位置;假设屏幕分辨率为1024x768，搜索框大约位于屏幕中央，我假设的鼠标位置大致能够点击到搜索框。实际操作时可能需要根据具体情况调整
LLM_response_editer:
从屏幕截图来看，浏览器地址栏中已经输入了bing的网址，现在要做的是输入搜索词。根据屏幕截图，搜索框在屏幕的中央位置上方一些。需要使用鼠标点击搜索框，然后可以使用键盘输入搜索词。

以下是json格式的操作步骤：

```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":512,"height":248}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text":"大语言模型的最近进展"}
]
```
current_task: 输入搜索词“大语言模型的最近进展”
task_prompt_en: Recent progress in searching large language models on the Internet
task_prompt_zh: 上网查大语言模型的最近进展
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. The video width is 1024 and the video height is 768. The overall goal is to "check the recent progress of the big language model online".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Double click to open the browser (Firefox Web Browser)
2. Enter the URL of bing in the browser address bar
3. Enter the search term "Recent progress of big language model"
4. Click the search button to search
5. Select the first link from the search results
6. Click the link to open the webpage
7. Read the web content for information
The current subtask is "Enter the search term" Recent progress of the big language model ".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current subtask is "Enter the search term" Recent progress of the big language model ". Please give detailed next steps according to the status of the existing screen image.

LLM_response_editer_en:
From the screenshot, we can see that the URL of bing has been entered in the browser address bar. Now we need to enter the search term. According to the screenshot, the search box is above the center of the screen. You need to click the search box with the mouse, and then you can use the keyboard to enter the search term.
The following steps are for json format:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 512, "height": 248}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "\u5927\u8bed\u8a00\u6a21\u578b\u7684\u6700\u8fd1\u8fdb\u5c55"}
]
```
